title: Use Case 9 : Oracle CST details
custom_preconds:
User decides to cancel the subscription. Check the URL for

 https://custservqaforms.mlbcontrol.net/forms/frmservlet?config=bam_prod
custom_steps:
1. Log into Oracle CST
2. Select Finance Automatic Refund from the left box and run the search
3. Select 1  for  MLB Namespace give the order no. in the correct field and run the search
4. Check the Process box in the right most column
5. Should get navigated to Select invoice page
6. Select Refund all in the top check box and press refund
7. Go back to the main page of the OCST and run a customer service search
8. Using the email id check for the order details - AR should be off
9. Go to Service Notes Tab - Refund information should be available to check
10. Refund is processed based on how long ago the order was made - less than 6 days, will issue full refund.  If not partial refunds will be honored for different reasons
11. Entitlement is revoked.
custom_expected: User checks all the details and checks for a confirmation email

custom_steps: User should be able to check the email about the refund / accepted/rejected / Partial.  confirm the prices are matching with the OCST transactions.
custom_expected: Receives the email and compares the details
